name: Light Up The Cube
description:
The Game Is Simple

All you have to do is to light up all the box to yellow color

Click the box and it will toggle between gray color(inactive) and yellow color(active).

When you click particular box, the 9x9 box around it will be affected and each of that box's state will be toggled between gray(inactive) and yellow(active)

Every time you the start the game, each box's state will be randomized.

Try and see how fast you can finish the puzzle.
